sourcesContent:
import { Link,useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState ,useMemo,} from "react"; import "./product.css"; import Chart from "../../components/chart/Chart" import {productData} from "../../dummyData" import { Publish } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; export default function Product() { const location = useLocation(); const [pStats,setPStats] =useState([]); const productId = location.pathname.split("/")[2]; const product = useSelector((state)=>state.product.products.find((index)=>index._id===productId)); console.log(product) const MONTHS = useMemo( () => [ "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Agu", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec", ], [] ); return (

Product

{product.title}
id: {product._id}
sales: 5123
in stock: {product.inStock}
); }
